name: Kuato Studios
overview:
Kuato Studios is a learning company focused on creating the most engaging platforms for kids to learn cool new skills. Frank Meehan, former board director for Spotify and Siri, founded Kuato Studios in 2011 together with the SRI, the creators of Siri, and Horizons Ventures, premier VC investors in Facebook, Spotify, Waze, Siri and Fixmo.

Kuato Studios has London and Palo Alto based teams, which consist of AI specialists and talent from world-renowned games studios such as EA, Konami and Sony, as well as award-winning experts from the educational field. They are developing AAA games that encourage the player to learn skills such as coding, science and graphic design through the creation and enhancement of their personalized game environment.

Kuato Studios is using next generation Virtual Personal Assistant technology (VPA 2.0) from SRI to power a range of characters and companions who adapt to, reason with, and remember the players they are interacting with.
